body.name: Bidet T Adapter With Shut off Valve,3 Way T Valve for Bidet, Metal T Adapter for Handheld Toilet, 7/8"×7/8"×1/2" or 3/8"
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 11 mins
features: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Our Toilet T Valve is made of high quality brass, brass has the advantages of strong pressure resistance and corrosion resistance, which can ensure the quality and service life. The surface is chrome-plated, so you don't need to worry about fading and can keep its exquisite appearance.

Bidet T- Adapter Tee Connector - Our adapter threads measure 7/8" x 7/8" x 1/2", 7/8" male threads for water supply hose connection, 7/8" female threads for toilet tank connection, and 1/2" threads for handheld spray hose connection. Also comes with a 1/2" X 3/8" adapter for connecting a 3/8" bidet toilet lid connection.

EASY TO USE: The bidet T-adapter is designed with a single lever, and the handle can be rotated 90 degrees to complete both the on/off switch, and can also be used to control the water flow and pressure of the hand-held spray nozzle. And it will not affect the normal operation of the toilet tank water flow

EASY TO INSTALL: The toilet T-valve is easy to install, with an upgraded wrench nut that is easy to operate with wet hands. It can be installed even when space is tight, no tools required. The kit comes with a tapered leak-proof gasket for leak-free installation and peace of mind.

The Bidet Basin T-Adapter is compatible with the Handheld Bidet Sprayer, Cloth Diaper Sprayer Kit and most other standard size T-Adapter Kits. Note: It is a bidet toilet attachment and cannot be used with showers or faucets!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Used In the Toilet System Bidet T-valve for installation under the toilet tank A shut-off valve allows you to control the flow of water to the bidet without affecting the flow of water to the toilet.
Bidet T-Adapter Details Type T-adapter diverter valve Material Brass Color Chrome-plated silver Connection Size 7/8"-7/8"-1/2" or 7/8"-7/8"-3/8" Range of use Toilet tank

Tee Connector Bidet Attachment for Toilet T-adapter shutoff valve connection size is 7/8"- 7/8"-1/2". 7/8" male threads for connection to water supply hose, 7/8" female threads for connection to toilet tank, and 1/2" threads for connection to hand-held spray hose. Also comes with a 1/2" X 3/8" adapter for connecting to a 3/8" bidet toilet lid connection.

Durable T-adapters are made of high-quality brass, which is corrosion-resistant and ruggedly constructed. Easy Installation Upgraded wrench thread for easy installation even in tight spaces. Kit comes with a conical washer for leak-free installation and peace of mind. Exquisite appearance The surface is treated with multi-layer chrome plating, which will not fade or lose color even after long time use, and enhance the overall aesthetic appearance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, no drips
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use with bidet install, BB2000 Biobidet, as the bidet only comes with a splitter that does not have a valve to turn off water to bidet. Had to return bidet and the valve is not leaking, seems well built/solid and valve is smooth/easy to turn.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I must have if your bidet installation doesn't fit your toilet
reviews.reviewText: So we ordered a handheld bidet sprayer and none of the fittings were fitting our toilet set up so I had to order this I was still nervous it wasn't going to work and it works perfectly now we can use our handheld today sprayer it saved the day easy to use easy to install nice finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits just right
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a bidet that came with a T-adapter, but the included T had improper threads and did not screw onto the toilet. This T-adapter worked as a perfect replacement and screwed onto the toilet and water hose easily. I like that it comes with several gaskets to fit different applications, teflon tape, and and adapter to fit two different sizes of bidet hose. It feels well built, and the shut-off valve moves very smoothly. It can be partially closed to reduce flow through the bidet as well. Quality product.
